name: Desert City
description:
Non-Comercial Use

Part of Unity education at PISMO Novska Croatia

Desert City is my second project in Unity at Simora PISMO Inkubator in Novska after month and a half of education. It was made in collaboration with  modeler Marijeta Šamec (https://www.facebook.com/marijeta.samec) who made 3D models of cowboy ghosts in Blender professional tool.

Story:

A  lone rider is in search for the lost treasure in abandoned desert city.  It is a race againts time and ghosts of former town residents who are trying to protect it against unwanted robbers. 

Game mechanics:

  • W,A,S,D for movement
  • 1,2,3 for weapon change (Pistol, Rifle, Shotgun)
  • R - reload
  • Esc - quit to main menu
